mapper.select: select p.name ,p.price ,p.th_img ,p.productid,p.sub_id, s.main_id,round(avg(r.star_score),1) starScoreAvg, count(r.reviewid) reviewcnt from product p,order_detail o,review r ,sub_category s where p.productid =o.productid and o.order_detailid=r.order_detailid and p.sub_id=s.sub_id and s.main_id=#{s.main_id} group by p.name,p.price,p.th_img,p.productid,p.sub_id,s.main_id order by productid
